status.info: This protocol was used to recovery low levels of inoculated Salmonella Typhimurium (ca. 0.30 CFU/mL) from surface water at four different USDA ARS research locations.

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"efspv","text":"Prepare for filtration by assembling vacuum set up, including a Buchner flask (collection) that fits the Pall magnetic filter funnel and can hold   of water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":146,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b5l3b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3bopi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"03201D20CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"90346","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"218m8","text":"Note: Set up should include a rubber stopper that fits Pall magnetic filter funnel.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f7lh2","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"161sn","text":"Prepare a decontamination station for magnetic filter funnel by filling 2 1 L beakers with   70% EtOH. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"83i78","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4ke87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7fvmt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"900","error":false,"guid":"138AFEA0CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"90347","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"epl1m","text":"Note: Ensure beakers are large enough to contain filter funnel and EtOH to cover funnel pieces.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55lak","text":"Place one 47-mm glass fiber filter into the bottom magnetic filter funnel (Forceps work well to gently pull one filter from stack and place into filter funnel) attached to Buchner funnel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36ank","text":"If needed use sterile forceps to gently 47-mm glass fiber filter into place to fit into bottom of the funnel.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":109,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3r9re","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A24C6650D6EA11ECAD6597CEB7B93627","height":733,"id":255241,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"58gb","text":"Forceps are being used to press the 47 mm glass fiber filter to the bottom of the magnetic funnel. The magnetic funnel is placed in a rubber stopper, which fits into a Buchner (sidearm) flask which is connected to a trap flask (if needed) and a vacuum. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_20220518_113212700 1.JPG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3imbsvfp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3ijbsvfp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3ikbsvfp.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3iibsvfp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5ls2","text":"If needed, add Control strain to surface water sample by gently tipping vial over the opening. Close bottle tightly and  mix sample thoroughly before proceeding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7r2t","text":"Measure 2 different sterile   portions of the cellulose pool-filter fiber (Aqua Dew™), contained in sterile tubes, and suspend ONE of those portions in   of sterile deionized water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":152,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9aaio","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"3B18BA20CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"90348","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"403C7E10CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"90349","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89hvh","text":"Pre-load glass filter with the pool-filter fiber by applying vacuum and pouring the   water / pool-filter fiber suspension over the glass fiber filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"11cee","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"4ADB4DB0CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"90350","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5vma","text":"Add the second   portion of pool-filter fiber to the   of sample water, close bottle tightly, and vigorously mix suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3m985","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"50431F80CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"90351","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"52994480CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"90352","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2a96","text":"Filter water sample by carefully pouring into 300 mL funnel and over pre-loaded 47 mm glass filter and allow vacuum to completely filter water sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1aokc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4js7k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F0C661A0D6F411ECA38CA524EC0B904A","height":985,"id":255245,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"80ckj","text":"Water contained in 300 mL magnetic funnel and flowing over 47mm glass fiber filter with vacuum pressure applied.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_0233.jpg","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3irbsvfp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3ipbsvfp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3iqbsvfp.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3inbsvfp.webp","width":328}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4uj9a","text":"If desired, use sterile deionized water to rinse off pool-filter fiber from sides of Pall filter funnel before turning off vacuum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94jhl","text":"Carefully and aseptically, using sterilized forceps, transfer the 47 mm glass fiber filter (filter cake) from the filter funnel into a Whirl-Pak® sample bag.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":158,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b8h21","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1sgol","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6p4b9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"61EA0220D6EA11ECAD6597CEB7B93627","height":733,"id":255249,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"elgku","text":"Magnetic funnel containing 47 mm glass fiber filter is separated from base, inverted, and sterile forceps are used to nudge or poke glass fiber filter (filtercake) into sterile Whirl-Pak bag. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_20220518_113605725 1.JPG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3ivbsvfp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3itbsvfp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3iubsvfp.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h3isbsvfp.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"f0otp","text":"NOTE: It is easier to pull magnetic portion of filter funnel off, tip on its side, and gently push filter cake from the bottom with sterile forceps, allowing it to fall into Whirl-Pak® bag.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhhs9","text":"Add   of 1 X BPW to Whirl-Pak bag and massage until filter cake until broken up.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7ole9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"6FE67D00CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"90353","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekfnc","text":"Decontaminate filter funnel pieces (2) individually by dropping them into first beaker of 70% EtOH. Allow for a minimum of   contact time before transferring to second 70% EtOH bath. After a second 2-min soak, rinse filter funnel pieces with DeI water and allow to dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":123,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"15fap","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"9BA42690CBB811ECBF4CEFD474489AE4","id":"80821","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
